duties.duty: Accounting of several legal entities in the 1c program.
Organization and maintenance of all areas of accounting - from primary documentation to tax and accounting.
Providing Oschadbank clients with qualified advice on banking products and services.
Execution of operations on payment cards at the request of clients.
Record keeping in accordance with the standards of document circulation of the university.
Providing technical assistance in the preparation of methodological and educational documents (materials).
Control over the execution of management orders.
